item.title: 鸡蛋短缺正袭扰餐馆，而且看不到缓解的迹象
item.description: 美国餐馆正在成为全国性鸡蛋短缺的受害者，从纽约市到旧金山的杂货店都受到了鸡蛋短缺的困扰，鸡蛋价格已涨至每箱 7 美元。【原文：American restaurants are falling victim to a national egg shortage that has already plagued grocery stores from New York City to San Francisco and sent prices to $7 a carton.】

item.title: 投资者涌入土耳其寻求通胀承诺的安慰
item.description: 土耳其实现通胀目标的能力是涌向伊斯坦布尔市场的外国投资者最关心的问题。【原文：Turkey’s ability to meet its inflation goals is a top concern of foreign investors who are flocking to Istanbul’s markets.】

item.title: 咖啡因供应问题创 45 年最长连涨纪录
item.description: 咖啡市场正努力解决主要种植区持续存在的供应问题，咖啡正迎来自 1980 年以来最长的连涨期。【原文：Coffee is headed for its longest winning streak since 1980, as the market grapples with persistent supply concerns in key growing regions.】

item.title: 欧佩克+即使在产量问题上与特朗普唱反调，也能安抚特朗普
item.description:
卡特尔拒绝了总统的降价呼吁，但更便宜的石油可能还是会到来。【原文：

The cartel snubs the president’s call to lower prices, but cheaper oil may be coming anyway.

】

item.title: Alphabet 的贴现估值是关税风险的一剂良药
item.description: 尽管成为中国政府报复美国贸易关税的目标，但 Alphabet 公司的持久增长和有吸引力的估值可能会使其免受所有地缘政治不确定性的影响。【原文：Despite being targeted by Beijing in retaliation to US trade tariffs, Alphabet Inc.’s durable growth and attractive valuation may offer insulation from all the geopolitical uncertainty.】

item.title: 西班牙政府计划将每周工时降至 37.5 小时
item.description: 西班牙政府达成协议，将每周工作时间从 40 小时减少到 37.5 小时，首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）正努力利用社会政策，但在议会中的支持率却很低。【原文：The Spanish government reached an agreement to reduce the number of workweek hours to 37.5 from 40, as Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez seeks to capitalize on social policies while struggling with weak support in parliament.】

item.title: 马斯克的 DOGE 颠覆重演了他的推特玩法，而且赌注更大
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）说，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）通过其新成立的政府效率部（Department of Government Efficiency）颠覆美国政府的举动，看起来很像他给推特（Twitter）带来的混乱，不过现在的风险要高得多。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner says Elon Musk’s moves to disrupt the US government with his new Department of Government Efficiency look a lot like the chaos he brought to Twitter, though the stakes are much higher now.】

item.title: PayPal 重新关注盈利增长，业绩超出预期
item.description: 贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. reports fourth-quarter earnings that topped Wall Street analyst estimates as the firm resets its focus on profitable growth in the year ahead.】

item.title: 毛里求斯在新任总督首次会议上将利率上调至 4.5%
item.description: 毛里求斯中央银行在新行长领导下召开的首次货币政策会议上上调了基准利率。【原文：Mauritius’ central bank raised its benchmark interest rate in the first monetary policy meeting under its new governor.】

item.title: 习近平对特朗普关税的谨慎回应表明中国损失更大
item.description: 中美最新贸易战的第一轮交锋表明，与唐纳德-特朗普第一任期相比，习近平采取了更加谨慎的态度。【原文：The first volleys in the latest US-China trade war made clear that Xi Jinping is taking a more cautious approach than during Donald Trump’s first term.】

item.title: 瑞银吸收瑞士更严格的交易规则，而全球同行却在拖延
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）表示，它成功地抵消了瑞士比其他主要司法管辖区更早对其交易业务实施的更严格规定的影响。【原文：UBS Group AG said it managed to offset the effect of tougher rules on its trading operations which Switzerland had introduced earlier than other major jurisdictions.】

item.title: 莫迪如何为特朗普奠定贸易基础
item.description: 在关税问题上，印度并不像加拿大、墨西哥和中国那样受到唐纳德-特朗普的青睐，但无论如何，很少有国家能像印度这样迅速采取行动来安抚这位新任美国总统。【原文：India isn’t in Donald Trump’s sights when it comes to tariffs in the way Canada, Mexico and China have been recently, but few countries have moved as quickly to placate the new US president anyway.】

item.title: 巴尔贝克最新抵押贷款基金融资 17 亿美元
item.description: 另类资产管理公司 Balbec Capital LP 已为其第六只旗舰基金获得超过 17 亿美元的投资承诺，该基金将投资于住宅和商业抵押贷款债务，是该公司迄今为止规模最大的基金。【原文：Alternative asset manager Balbec Capital LP has clinched more than $1.7 billion in commitments for its sixth flagship fund, which will invest in residential and commercial mortgage debt, making it the firm’s largest to date.】

item.title: 巴西央行提高对短期通胀问题的警惕
item.description: 巴西央行称，未来六个月的年通胀率将高于可承受范围，因为尽管积极加息，但食品价格仍大幅上涨，服务成本仍居高不下。【原文：Brazil’s central bank said annual inflation will run above the tolerance range for the next six months, as food prices rise significantly and services costs remain elevated despite aggressive interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 因特萨集团利润超预期，将回购 20 亿欧元股票
item.description: 意大利联合圣保罗银行（Intesa Sanpaolo SpA）宣布回购价值 20 亿欧元（21 亿美元）的新股票，因为其利润超出预期。【原文：Intesa Sanpaolo SpA announced a new share buyback worth €2 billion ($2.1 billion) as its profit beat estimates.】

item.title: 关税转机让投资者仍心有余悸
item.description: 鉴于唐纳德-特朗普在关税问题上的转变，股市没有出现热烈的缓解性反弹，这表明投资者对过去 48 小时内发生的事件感到伤痕累累。【原文：The lack of an enthusiastic relief rally in stock markets given Donald Trump’s turnaround on tariffs shows investors are feeling bruised by the events of the past 48 hours.】

item.title: 首席财务官称泰晤士水务顾问费可能突破 2 亿英镑
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司在寻找股权投资者和削减负债的过程中，最终可能会在今年年中之前向顾问支付约 2 亿英镑（约合 2.48 亿美元）的费用。【原文：Thames Water will likely end up paying around £200 million ($248 million) to advisers by the middle of this year, as the firm looks to find an equity investor and cut its liabilities.】

item.title: 花旗集团策略师称准备再次做空法国债券
item.description: 法国政府债券的回升已将一项关键风险指标推至 9 月份以来的最低点，但这一回升有可能转瞬即逝。【原文：A recovery in French government bonds that’s pushed a key risk metric to its lowest since September threatens to prove fleeting.】

item.title: 信贷吸引客户，阿波罗私人财富公司融资创纪录
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc.’s plan to tap wallets of rich clients is paying off, with its wealth business raking in record capital last year and boosting assets from the sector 50%.】

item.title: 阿波罗建立 50 亿美元多策略基金，存续期 30 年
item.description: 随着私人资本公司越来越多地寻求吸引保险业现金的新方法，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. has built a $5 billion multi-strategy credit fund with a 30-year maturity as private capital firms increasingly look for novel ways to attract insurance-industry cash.】

item.title: 澳大利亚出于安全考虑禁止 DeepSeek 使用政府技术
item.description: 澳大利亚已禁止所有政府系统和设备使用 DeepSeek 人工智能服务，成为首批对今年震动硅谷和全球市场的中国人工智能初创公司采取直接行动的国家之一。【原文：Australia has banned DeepSeek AI services from all government systems and devices, becoming one of the first countries to take direct action against a Chinese artificial intelligence startup that shook Silicon Valley and global markets this year.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 投资的 SailPoint 公司及股东寻求 10.5 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: SailPoint 公司是 Thoma Bravo 旗下的一家企业安全软件公司，其股东正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集多达 10.5 亿美元的资金。【原文：SailPoint Inc., an enterprise security software company owned by Thoma Bravo, and shareholders are seeking to raise as much as $1.05 billion in its initial public offering.】

item.title: 阿布扎比的 Adnoc 将把美国资产转移到新的全球部门 XRG
item.description: 阿布扎比的主要能源公司将向其新成立的国际投资公司 XRG PJSC 转移一些美国资产的股份，这也是其推动成立一家价值 800 亿美元的全球企业的一部分。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s main energy company will transfer stakes in some US assets to its new international investment firm, XRG PJSC, part of a push to create a $80 billion global venture.】

item.title: Spotify 用户数超预期，首次实现年度盈利
item.description: Spotify Technology SA 公布的另一季度用户增长情况好于预期，这家瑞典音乐公司首次实现了年度盈利。【原文：Spotify Technology SA posted another quarter of better-than-expected subscriber growth, with the Swedish music company recording its first-ever annual profit.】

item.title: 特朗普暂停征收贸易关税给新兴市场带来喘息机会
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普推迟对墨西哥和加拿大商品征收新关税，以及中国对美国提高征税作出相对谨慎的回应之后，新兴市场资产周二上涨。【原文：Emerging-markets assets gained on Tuesday after US President Donald Trump delayed new tariffs on goods from Mexico and Canada, and China delivered a relatively measured response to higher levies from the US.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发市场震荡，美国以太币 ETF 交易量创新高
item.description: 投资以太币的美国交易所交易基金周一的交易量创下历史新高，原因是受唐纳德-特朗普总统领导下的持续贸易紧张局势的影响，数字资产的杠杆头寸大幅平仓。【原文：US exchange-traded funds investing in Ether saw record trading volumes on Monday as leveraged positions in the digital asset unwound sharply, rattled by ongoing trade tensions under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 巴西和墨西哥石油出口骤降导致全球石油出口大幅下降
item.description: 受墨西哥和巴西石油运输量骤降的影响，1 月份海运石油量急剧下降。【原文：The flow of seaborne oil fell sharply in January, led by a plunge in shipments from Mexico and Brazil.】

item.title: 实现利润目标后，韦莱韬悦转投并购业务
item.description: 威利斯韬睿惠生公司（Willis Towers Watson Plc）在去年实现了关键的盈利和收入目标后，正将下一阶段的增长重点放在兼并和收购上。【原文：Willis Towers Watson Plc is focusing on mergers and acquisitions for its next phase of growth, after hitting key earnings and revenue targets last year.】

item.title: Coinbase 敦促美国消除银行加密货币服务障碍
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc. 正敦促美国银行业监管机构澄清或修改其立场，以允许银行为加密货币提供托管和交易执行服务，并为银行与 Coinbase 等公司的合作扫清障碍。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. is urging US banking regulators to clarify or amend their positions in order to allow banks to offer custody and trading execution services for cryptocurrencies as well as clear the path for them to partner with the likes of Coinbase.】
